definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled

sentences.english: Belly-painting isgrowing more popular as a baby-shower activity, Thompson says.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森说，作为婴儿淋浴活动，肚皮画越来越受欢迎。

sentences.english: How, Thompson asked, could PayPal capture more of that business?
sentences.chinese: 汤普森询问贝宝怎样才能抓住更多的生意机会？

sentences.english: I'd like to invite you and MR. tompson to have a dinner before leaving.
sentences.chinese: 在我离开之前，我想请你和汤普森先生吃饭。

sentences.english: Mr Thompson is Nitze’s grandson. But he does not play favourites.
sentences.chinese: 虽然汤普森是尼采的孙子，可他并不偏袒汤普森。

sentences.english: Mr Thompson is Nitze’s grandson. But he does not play favourites.
sentences.chinese: 虽然汤普森是尼采的孙子，可他并不偏袒汤普森。

sentences.english: Obviously you guys know my relationship with David Thompson.
sentences.chinese: 显然，你们知道我与大卫汤普森的关系。

sentences.english: "I swim with these fish, they're magnificent," Thompson said.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森说，“我和这些鱼一起游泳，它们是壮丽的。
汤普森是位著名的运动员。

sentences.english: For thismother-to-be, Thompson created a design based on cowrie shells."They're
sentences.chinese: 汤普森根据玛瑙贝为这位准妈妈创作了一幅画。

sentences.english: It was invented and refined by Thompson over eight years.
sentences.chinese: 这项成果是汤普森潜心研究超过8年的发明。

sentences.english: Mr.Thompson is going to sell it because it is haunted.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森先生之所以想卖它，是因为那里常闹鬼。

sentences.english: Mrs.. Thompson paid particular attention to Teddy.
sentences.chinese: 汤普森夫人对特迪倾注了特别的关心。

sentences.english: The Thompsons will move to a new flat when their baby is/has been born.
sentences.chinese: 孩子出生以后，汤普森一家将搬到一个新的公寓去住。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Wade (name)/Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), sinologist 威妥瑪|威妥玛[Wei1 Tuo3 ma3]
